sqlMap.select:
select id, sourcename, sourcetype, dbtype, serveraddr, port, username, pwd, dbname, dbtablename, filter, basedn, dominodriver, namesfile, timeout, descp from
(select top $pageSize$ * from otppms_usersource where sourcename not in
(select top $startRow$ sourcename from otppms_usersource order by sourcename asc) order by sourcename asc) otppms_usersource where 1=1
sourcename like '%$sourcename$%'
order by sourcename asc
